name: The Island of the Forerunners
description:
Our ancestors left us thousands years ago.
All that remains of them is this island full of ancient and incomprehensible mechanisms.
Legends say that the ancients left us a way to contact them as a last resort.

Now that our people are dying, this legends are our last hope.

It's the second game in my 2021:GameAMonth project.
The theme for the first month was "FIND&CLICK".
